```{r}
results %>%
  filter(neutral == FALSE) %>%
  mutate(score_diff = home_score - away_score) %>%
  group_by(tournament) %>%
  summarise(games = n(),
            home_wins = length(home_result[home_result == "W"]),
            home_draws = length(home_result[home_result == "D"]),
            home_losses = length(home_result[home_result == "L"]),
            home_win_pct = home_wins / games,
            home_draw_pct = home_draws / games,
            home_loss_pct = home_losses / games,
            home_score_diff = mean(score_diff)) %>%
  arrange(-home_score_diff) %>%
  filter(games >= 150) %>%
  select(tournament, home_win_pct:home_score_diff)
```
